Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions

The interfaces and factories for actions and action contributions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    The base building block of a template.
    ActionBody
    The body of an action.
    ActionContribution
    Contributes to an action.
    ActionContributionFactory
    Creates an action contribution.
    ActionContributionOptions
    Ways in which an action contribution can contribute to an action.
    ActionFactory
    Creates an action.
    ActionParameter
    A parameter of an action.
    ClassBasedActionFactory
    An action factory that creates actions based on their classes.
    DynamicallyParameterisable
    Implemented by actions that are created by the default action factory and support dynamic parameters.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAction
    Reduces the effort it takes to implement the Action interface and offers some convenience methods.
    AbstractActionContribution
    A contribution that can be made to any action.
    AbstractDynamicallyParameterisableAction
    An abstract action that allows dynamic parameters, which it stores and offers to its subclasses.
    ActionContributionInformation
    Provides information about an action contribution.
    ActionInformation
    Provides information about an Action.
    ActionParameterInformation
    Provides information about the parameter of an action.
    CompoundActionParameter
    An action parameter that is composed of other action parameters.
    ConstantActionParameter
    An action parameter with a constant value.
    ContributingAction
    An action that makes an action contribution.
    ContributingActionFactory
    Creates actions that, when executed, make an action contribution.
    DefaultActionContributionFactory
    An action contribution factory that's based on a action contribution class and examines it to retrieve information about it.
    DefaultActionContributionOptions
    A default action contributions options implementation that keeps track of all chosen options, so that they can be applied to an action context.
    DefaultActionFactory
    An action factory that takes an action class and examines it to collect information about it.
    ExpressionActionParameter
    An action parameter with a value that is based on the evaluation of an expression.

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.actions Description

The interfaces and factories for actions and action contributions. For more information on these subjects, please see the action and action contribution wiki pages.
